overview:
Jordan Ferguson is the Managing Director of VideoEgg Europe. Before joining VideoEgg, Jordan had a career in venture capital and stock broking in Europe, North America and Asia. He has held a series of Vice President/Director and Managing Director positions in new media and ecommerce companies, including 24/7 Real Media and Betfair. While at Betfair, Jordan ran the business in twelve countries, managing marketing, business development, sales and operations teams, rapidly accelerating annual revenues across these markets to in excess of $25 million.

via: VideoEgg
